devdoc.details: This contract is a stub to recover mainnet funds sent to the Prysmatic Labs testnet address.  The testnet contract is deployed on Goerli, not on Ethereum's main network. Do not send funds here! If you sent funds here by mistake, please email contact at prysmaticlabs.com with  proof that you are the originator of the lost funds.

approveERC20Funds(address,address,uint25.details: Approve ERC20 spending for a particular ERC20 token.

params._spender: The spender address to authorize spending on behalf of this contract.

changeOwner(address).details: Change the sole owner of the contract.

params._newOwner: the address of the new owner of this contract.

constructor.details: Initialize the contract with the contract creator as the owner.

recoverERC20Funds(address).details: Send all of the ERC20 token owned by this contract to the contract owner.

recoverETHFunds().details: Send all ETH held by the contract to the contract owner.

devdoc.title: DoNotSendFundsHere
